p: The total LPS level was specifically increased in ep mice compared with WT mice ( Figure 4A,B). LPS promotes platelet activation and the formation of foam cells. Both platelet activation and the formation of foam cells contribute to the progression of atherosclerosis [ 38]. LPS also plays an important role in the inflammatory response. LPS treatment can promote chemotactic migration of various cells such as mouse fibroblasts, human glioma cells, and some human leukemia THP-1 cells, thereby promoting atherosclerosis [ 39].
